DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare efficacy vitro fertilization ( IVF ) versus laparoscopic ovarian drilling ( LOD ) infertile woman clomiphene citrate ( CC ) resistant polycystic ovarian syndrome ( PCOS ) .
DOC.brief_title: IVF Versus LOD Women With CC Resistant PCOS
DOC.detailed_description: Women randomly divide two group ; IVF group LOD group . Women IVF group undergo one full IVF cycle . Women LOD group subject LOD follow ovarian stimulation spontaneous ovulation occur within 2 month .
DOC.criteria: Infertile woman PCOS define Rotterdam criterion . CC resistance ( defined failure ovulation receive 150 mg/day CC 5 consecutive day per cycle , least 3 consecutive cycle ) . Age < 20 > 35 year . Presence infertility factor anovulatory PCOS . Previous history ovarian surgery surgical removal one ovary . Previous exposure cytotoxic drug pelvic irradiation . Oral hypoglycemic hormonal therapy either currently precede 3 month . Metabolic hormonal abnormality .
